actions.recommendation: -Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram

- Avoid foods that high in saturated fats like butter, baked goods, wors and some meat products. Fish, seeds, nuts & avocados are high in good fats. Choose lean meats. Supplements like Rychol help lower cholesterol
- Red meat, organ meat and alcohol increase uric acid. This can cause gout and stones. Limit your intake

- Your BMI and waist to height ratio are a slightly elevated. This is associated with the risk of developing lifestyle diseases like hypertension and diabetes. Aim to keep your BMI between 18-25 and waist to height circumference below 50
